about_the_game:
You're Stephen (the Male Protagonist's default name), head of the private security firm Dragonspire Security Force (The DSF). It is set in a Dark modern world with a massive surprise to Fantasy, including Corruption, Death, Tough Choices, and entire Character Progression while the shape of the world around you changes based on your choices and actions.



Full progress tracking via the phone in-game (accessible anytime where no choices are required.)
Vault unlockables (Images, videos, new and replay scenes.)
Profiles of important people with Relationship Points (RP), Affinity, and Corruption percent, and filled with information you know about them along with key moments you've done.
There are a lot of sex scenes to experience, and it often may lead to many partners at once if you prefer to share them.




Do you fight or succumb to it? Choices matter, and so does your alignment. Are you someone people can trust or just another tyrant? Do you care for those you meet or change them?




We start off looking like an average city, doing average things... You start to discover the world for what it truly is... Full of mystery, mythology, creatures, powers, abilities...




The romance you will experience along the way will be rewarding and have an in-depth storyline. It is up to you if you settle down or check all your options. There are a lot of women in Dragonspire. Some you've known your entire life, some you just met, even some you should never meet. Not everyone will be willing to settle down for a relationship. Make sure you're making the right choices you desire.

content_descriptors.notes: The Dragonspire contains graphic violence, adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, and graphic sexual content.
